item.title: Search Google Photos by Device
item.description: I'm trying to search my photos in Google Photos by device name (iPhone or Google Pixel or ...), but it's strange. I have a Google Pixel 5, if I try to search for Google Pixel 5, I can get all photos shot by it, but if I only input Google Pixel to search, it only shows partial photos. I'm not sure about Google's search algorithm, I just record my test results.
